title: Understanding Aggression
text: Aggression is often confused with anger, but they are not the same. Think about the intention behind the behavior.

title: Aggression vs. Anger
text: While anger is an emotional state, aggression involves actions. Consider what actions are intended to achieve.

hintAnswer: aggression pertains to behaviors intended to harm or assert dominance over others
title: Defining Aggression
text: Aggression is characterized by behaviors that are intended to do what?
choices: subjective, emotional state characterized by antagonism toward someone or something perceived as causing harm or offense
aggression pertains to behaviors intended to harm or assert dominance over others
intentional use of physical force that results in injury, pain, or impairment
inability to manage or appropriately express emotions
